summary.overview: The application is a web-based dictionary that allows users to search for word definitions, pronunciations, and examples. It also provides a daily quote, manages bookmarks for frequently accessed words, and maintains a history of recent searches.
summary.predefined_options: The application uses predefined options such as default values for input fields and preset selections for bookmarks and recent searches.
summary.external_resources: The application uses external resources such as quotes from 'https://type.fit/api/quotes' and 'http://api.quotable.io/random', and word data from 'https://api.dictionaryapi.dev/api/v2/entries/en/'.
summary.external_js_libraries: The application uses external JavaScript libraries such as jQuery (https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/2.2.4/jquery.min.js), Bootstrap (https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/bootstrap@5.1.3/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min.js), and Modernizr (https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/modernizr/2.8.3/modernizr.js).

requirements.description: When the page loads, the system should hide the loading animation to indicate that the page is ready for interaction.
Upon clicking the 'Search' button, if the search input is empty, the system should display a toast notification with an error message prompting the user to enter a word.
Upon clicking the 'Search' button with a valid word, the system should fetch the word's definition, pronunciation, and example from the dictionary API and display them in the result card.
Upon clicking the 'Reset' button, the system should clear the search input field and hide the result card.
Upon clicking the 'Bookmark' icon on a word's result card, the system should toggle the bookmark status and update the list of bookmarked words in the offcanvas section.
Upon clicking the 'Audio' button on a word's result card, the system should play the pronunciation audio of the word.
The system should display a random quote and its author on the page load, fetched from an external quotes API.
The system should maintain a list of recently searched words and display them in the 'Recent Searches' section.
Upon clicking the 'Back to Top' button, the system should scroll the page to the top.
The system should allow users to delete bookmarked words from the list in the offcanvas section.
The system should display popovers with word meanings when hovering over or focusing on recently searched words.
